remarks: The orthocomplement of the unique poset element such that ` ps ` . ( ~ riotaneg analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
riotaoc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
riotaoc.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
riotaoc.a $e |- ( x = ( ._|_ ` y ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
riotaocN $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ E! x e. B ph ) -> ( iota_ x e. B ph ) = ( ._|_ ` ( iota_ y e. B ps ) ) ) $.
$d ._|_ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
